short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks a button on specific pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Movie Intro Skipper Chrome Extension automatically clicks the "Skip Intro" button on specific streaming platforms like Netflix, Crunchyroll, and Disney+. Users can also add custom texts to be skipped via the extension's popup interface.
